  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public String addUser(String nickname, String cc, Calendar iniDate, int option)
      This method creates an object consumer user and add it into the arraylist users. Also, depends of the case to save the certain information by type of user (Standard or premium).
      Parameters:
      nickname - String, nickname of the consumer user to add.
      cc - String, number identification card of the consumer user to add.
      iniDate - Calendar, the joining date to the platform.
      option - int, the option which it will store the consumer user data by its type.
      Returns:
      messsage:String. Verification of the process.

    • addUser

      public String addUser(String nickname, String cc, Calendar iniDate, String name, String url, int option)
      This method creates an object producer user and add it into the arraylist users. Also, depends of the case to save the certain information by type of user (Artist or creator).
      Parameters:
      nickname - String, nickname of the producer user to add.
      cc - String, number identification card of the producer user to add.
      iniDate - Calendar, the joining date to the platform.
      name - String, name of the producer user to add.
      url - String, url of the profile image of the producer user to add.
      option - int, the option which it will store the producer user data by its type.
      Returns:
      messsage:String. Verification of the process.

    • addContent

      public String addContent(String name, String url, double length, int numRep, String album, double price, int numSold, int genre, int number)
      Method to add song data to audios arraylist and to a certain Artist to which this content belongs.
      Parameters:
      name - :String. Song's name.
      url - :String. Song's album url cover.
      length - :double. Song's length.
      numRep - :int. Song's number of visualizations.
      album - :String. Song's album name.
      price - :double. Song's price.
      numSold - :int. Number of sold units.
      genre - :int. Song's genre.
      number - :int. Position of the artist user which belongs this content.
      Returns:
      register:String. A message about the result of the process.

    • addContent

      public String addContent(String name, String url, double length, int numRep, String desc, int category, int number)
      Method to add podcast data to audios arraylist and to a certain Creator to which this content belongs.
      Parameters:
      name - :String. Podcast's name.
      url - :String. Podcast's url image.
      length - :double. Podcast's length.
      numRep - :int. Podcast's number of visualizations.
      desc - :String. Podcast's description.
      category - :int. Podcast's category.
      number - :int. Position of the creator user which belongs this content.
      Returns:
      register:String. A message about the result of the process.

    • search

      public boolean search(String cc)
      This method search and obtains a boolean by a given cc(identificacion) as identifier of the user.
      Parameters:
      cc - :String, identification of the user to find.
      Returns:
      confirmation:boolean. The result (true or false) of the process.

    • giveInformationPeople

      public String giveInformationPeople()
      Method to show the toString Method (incorporated in every user and daugther user classes) of a certain user .
      Returns:
      message: String. The information of the user.

    • giveInformationAudios

      public String giveInformationAudios()
      Method to show the toString Method (incorporated in every audio and daugther audio classes) of a certain audio.
      Returns:
      message: String. The information of the audio.

    • showArtists

      public String showArtists()
      Method to show the Artist user that are created in the platform.
      Returns:
      position: String. The position with a few atributes of an user of every created artist user.

    • showCreators

      public String showCreators()
      Method to show the Creator user that are created in the platform.
      Returns:
      position: String. The position with a few atributes of an user of every created creator user.

    • searchU

      public User searchU(String cc)
      This method search and obtains an user by a given cc(identificacion) as identifier of the user.
      Parameters:
      cc - :String, identification of the user to find.
      Returns:
      objUser:User. The object User found.

    • addPlaylist

      public String addPlaylist(String name, String cc, int option)
      Method to add a playlist that is created for Standard or Premium user.
      Parameters:
      name - :String, name of the playlist.
      cc - :String, identification of the user that belongs this playlist.
      option - int, the option which it will store the playlist data by its consumer user type.
      Returns:
      message: String, verification of the process.

    • editPlaylist

      public String editPlaylist(String name, int option, int id)
      Method to modify certain things of a created playlist.
      Parameters:
      name - :String, name of the playlist.
      option - :int, the option that will define the process to be performed on that playlist.
      id - :int, the id of the playlist.
      Returns:
      message: String, verification of the process.

    • search

      public Playlist search(int id)
      This method search and obtains a Playlist by a given number as identifier of the playlist.
      Parameters:
      id - int, identification of the playlist to find.
      Returns:
      obj:Playlist. The object Playlist found.

    • showListGenres

      public String showListGenres()
      Show a list where, inside of it, are genres of a song.
      Returns:
      a list as a constant that provides the genres of a song.
